name: flowers and whimsies
description:
itty bitty spaces for itty bitty pixies. For endless competition, graceful falling, and floral destruction. It's the feeling of flying while prancing and using others as footstools to keep in the air as long as possible. Play against your friends to pull ahead of the competition. 

solar pixie:  A & D to move left and right, W to double jump

lunar pixie:  arrow left & arrow right to move left and right, arrow up to double jump
